column7: 2015 at niagara rehabilitation & nursing center. born in niagara falls on august 21

column12: nc and kelly pollitt of arlington. besides her parents she was predeceased by her husband michael h. swidergal and one brother. there is no prior visitation. funeral services and burial will take place at the convenience of the family. arrangements entrusted to zajac funeral home inc. print add condolence 319 24th st
